practiceMsg:
Answer 30 practice questions.

No time limit.
testMsg:
Answer 15 questions.

Score 75% or above in 5 mins to pass the test
earnMsg: Watch sponsored content to earn +2 credits?

questions.questionText: Name the mausoleum in Agra that is one of the most famous landmarks in India.
